content:
# Factorio Agent Report

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Power generation facility at x=-9.5 to x=-2.5
Consists of:
- Offshore pump (x=-9.5, y=-0.5)
- Boiler (x=-6.5, y=0.0) - currently out of fuel
- Steam engine (x=-2.5, y=0.5) - not connected to power network

### Oil production facility at x=17.5 to x=37.5
Consists of:
- Pumpjack (x=17.5, y=40.5) - not receiving electricity
- Oil refinery (x=27.5, y=40.5) - not receiving electricity, set to BasicOilProcessing recipe
- Storage tank (x=32.5, y=40.5) - contains petroleum gas
- Chemical plant (x=37.5, y=40.5) - not receiving electricity, set to PlasticBar recipe
- Wooden chest with coal (x=37.5, y=37.5)
- Inserter (x=37.5, y=38.5) - not receiving electricity, connects chest to chemical plant

## ERROR TIPS

### Incorrect prototype naming
- Use `Prototype.PumpJack` instead of `Prototype.Pumpjack` when placing pumpjacks

### Entity connection errors
- Set recipes on buildings before connecting pipes:
  - Oil refineries need `BasicOilProcessing` or other recipe set before pipe connections
  - Chemical plants need recipes like `PlasticBar` set before pipe connections

### Fluid system issues
- Ensure source entities have fluid before connecting to chemical plants
- Check fluid box contents before making connections

### Power issues
- Connect all buildings to power poles before operation:
  - Pumpjack at x=17.5 y=40.5 has no power
  - Oil refinery at x=27.5 y=40.5 has no power
  - Chemical plant at x=37.5 y=40.5 has no power
  - Inserter at x=37.5 y=38.5 has no power

### Fuel management
- Keep boilers fueled with coal or other fuel sources
- Current boiler at x=-6.5 y=0.0 is out of fuel

### Entity inspection
- Verify entity has inventory before attempting inspection
- Storage tanks need fluid contents to inspect properly

### Production verification
- Check entity status after placement and connection:
  - Use `EntityStatus.WORKING` as success indicator
  - Handle other statuses like `FLUID_INGREDIENT_SHORTAGE` appropriately
